item.title: Android刷机和Root
item.author: 作者
item.description: Android刷机和Root 刷机 下载刷机包. https://source.android.com/setup/start/build-numbers https://developers.google.com/android/images 1 2 #目前我手机为Nexus 5X wget https://dl.google.com/dl/android/aosp/bullhead-opm1.171019.011-factory-3be6fd1c.zip 解压. 1 7z x bullhead-opm1.171019.011-factory-3be6fd1c.zip 校验SHA-256 Checksum,必须与官
